card_text: During the Battle Phase: Target 1 "War Rock" monster in your GY, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon that target in Attack Position, but for the rest of this turn, its effects are negated, also it cannot attack directly.$N●Special Summon that target in Defense Position, also the first time each "War Rock" monster you control would be destroyed by battle this turn, it is not destroyed.$NYou can only activate 1 "War Rock Spirit" per turn.
